entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
